tasks.label: Artisan: version
tasks.command: docker compose exec -w /var/www/html app php artisan --version

tasks.label: Artisan: migrate
tasks.command: docker compose exec -w /var/www/html app php artisan migrate

tasks.label: Cache: all
tasks.command: docker compose exec -w /var/www/html app sh -lc 'php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache'

tasks.label: Nginx: reload
tasks.command: docker compose exec webserver nginx -s reload
